name: Asterword Field Escape
description:
Dear Pilot,

     Move your ship using the mouse. Shoot by clicking on a asteroid. The letter of the asteroid is added to your targeting computer. Right click to claim the word. You gain resources by claiming valid words, you can use resources to buy ammo, vowels, and even a railgun. Get the highest score you can and don't get blown up. Good Luck!

-Admiral Hoffmeyer

Dev Note: all feedback is appreciated, contact me at hellfirestudios2025@gmail.com
